byline.original: By DENNIS B. ROSS and ANDREW J. TABLER

lead_paragraph: The White House is pursuing a dangerous deal with Russia that will only help Bashar al-Assad hold on to power. It’s time for a drastic change.
snippet: The White House is pursuing a dangerous deal with Russia that will only help Bashar al-Assad hold on to power. It’s time for a drastic change....
abstract: Op-Ed article by public policy fellows Dennis B Ross and Andrew J Tabler criticizes Obama administration's plan to work with Russian military in Syria in exchange for getting Russia to force Pres Bashar al-Assad to stop military assaults on areas where no extremist groups are present; holds plan has significant flaws and loopholes that show a level of foreign policy inexperience and lack of understanding of dangerous consequences to be faced should Russia choose to escalate conflict.
